mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_NICK = #{updateNickname}, PROFILE_IMG = #{profileImg}, STACK = #{stack}, SLOGAN = #{slogan}, INTRODUCE = #{introduce}, SKILL = #{skill} WHERE MEMBER_NO = ${memberNo}
mapper.select: SELECT ca.MEMBER_NO, CONTEST_TITLE, CREATE_DATE, END_DATE , MEMBER_NICK, PROFILE_IMG FROM CONTEST_ATTEND ca , CONTEST c , "MEMBER" m WHERE ca.CONTEST_NO = c.CONTEST_NO AND c.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO AND ca.MEMBER_NO = ${memberNo}
SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICK, STACK, PROFILE_IMG, INTRODUCE, SKILL, CURR_PRICE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = ${memberNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET PROFILE_IMG = #{profileImg}, MEMBER_NICK =#{memberNick}, INTRODUCE = #{introduce}, REGION_NO = #{regionNo} WHERE MEMBER_NO = ${memberNo}
mapper.select: SELECT CONTEST_NO, MEMBER_NO, CONTEST_TITLE, TRUNC(END_DATE - CREATE_DATE) AS DUE_DATE, PRICE, THUMBNAIL FROM CONTEST WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT CONTEST_NO,MEMBER_NO, CONTEST_TITLE, TRUNC(END_DATE - CREATE_DATE) AS DUE_DATE, PRICE, THUMBNAIL FROM CONTEST WHERE CON_STATUS = '모집중' AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT CONTEST_NO,MEMBER_NO, CONTEST_TITLE, TRUNC(END_DATE - CREATE_DATE) AS DUE_DATE, PRICE, THUMBNAIL FROM CONTEST WHERE CON_STATUS = '심사중' AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT CONTEST_NO,MEMBER_NO, CONTEST_TITLE, TRUNC(END_DATE - CREATE_DATE) AS DUE_DATE, PRICE, THUMBNAIL FROM CONTEST WHERE CON_STATUS = '완료' AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT m.MEMBER_NICK, m.SLOGAN, m.STACK, m.PROFILE_IMG FROM MEMBER m JOIN LIKE_USER l ON m.MEMBER_NO = l.P_MEMBER_NO WHERE l.C_MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT m.MEMBER_NICK, m.PROFILE_IMG, m.SLOGAN, m.STACK, m.MEMBER_NO FROM MEMBER m INNER JOIN CONTEST_ATTEND c ON m.MEMBER_NO = c.MEMBER_NO WHERE c.CONTEST_NO = #{contestNo}

SELECT c.CONTEST_TITLE, c.CON_STATUS, TRUNC(c.END_DATE - c.CREATE_DATE) AS DUE_DATE, COUNT(a.CONTEST_NO) AS ATTEND_COUNT FROM CONTEST c LEFT JOIN CONTEST_ATTEND a ON c.CONTEST_NO = a.CONTEST_NO WHERE c.CONTEST_NO = #{contestNo} GROUP BY c.CONTEST_TITLE, c.CON_STATUS, c.END_DATE, c.CREATE_DATE
